body:
As a kid have you ever played the game Coke or Pepsi? Well if you haven't you can try it out on this post. The way this works is that one person posts a "would you rather" question such as "Coke or Pepsi and the person below has to answer it and come up with a new question. Here's an example...

Bob: Would you rather punch your best friend or your mom?

Dave: Best friend.
           Would you rather eat pizza or candy for breakfeast?

      Please continue this pattern and keep things appropriate and no dating/love questions. Thank you :). 

PS. Coke or Pepsi? (Choose one)

      Please continue this pattern and keep things appropriate and no dating/love questions. Thank you :). 

PS. Coke or Pepsi? (Choose one)
